description:
Curator's Note - Recently patched to play on Touchpad!

Fight against aggressive aliens, the 'judges', and ensure the survival of mankind in this space epic. 

When the earth became uninhabitable, huge satellites called 'near orbitals' were built on which humans could survive. To protect them, the near orbitals have joined forces to form the Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance, NOVA. A threat is approaching from deep in space. A military spaceship that has been missing for a week reappears and heads for the near orbitals without responding to calls. Against his will, Kal Wardin is recalled from retirement to active duty to prevent the extinction of humanity. 

NOVA - Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance offers a unique gaming experience!

EPIC SINGLE Player
- 13 crazy levels 
- 5 completely different environments from real to fantastic: jungle, snow mountains, spaceship, bunker and alien city 
- 6 weapons: assault rifle, shotgun, sniper rifle, pistol, rocket launcher and plasma rifle - plus grenades and machine guns in some levels
- 1 Exciting storyline with cinematic cutscenes and character voices

INTENSE MULTIPLAYER MODE 
- Local or online via Wi-Fi 
- Deathmatch for 1-4 players
- 5 different environments
-  Play via Gameloft LIVE! against your friends or the whole world 
- worldwide leaderboards in the game and on the official website www.near-orbit-vanguard-alliance.com

TECHNOLOGY LEAP
- Environments completely in 3D with extremely detailed graphics 
- 3 types of control 
- Customizable interface 

N.O.V.A., the Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance, needs you in this fight!
Sign up on Twitter @NOVA_fps 
More information at www.near-orbit-vanguard-alliance.com 

*** Tested on: Pre, Pre2
versionNote: Revisionist History Note - This PDK game has been patched to work on Pre3 and TouchPad.
